profile.name: swiyu Trust Infrastructure Interoperability Profile (Public Beta)
profile.notes: Mapped to the swiyu Interoperability Profile page. OID4VCI and OID4VP draft numbers and DID method names reflect the profile's stated mappings; where the profile uses DID:TDW terminology, this is mapped to didWebvh in the FIDES capability set.

oid4vci.note: Uses OpenID4VCI draft-13 mapping; supports issuance for vc+sd-jwt (SD-JWT VC).

other.note: No other issuance protocols profiled for Public Beta.

oid4vp.note: Uses OpenID4VP draft-20 mapping; presentation for vc+sd-jwt.

other.note: Other presentation transports (e.g., offline/BLE) are out of scope for this profile.

sdJwtVc.note: SD-JWT VC is the profiled credential format (OID4VCI/OID4VP format identifier: vc+sd-jwt).

isoMdoc.note: ISO mdoc is not included in the Public Beta interop profile.

vcdm20.note: Profile focuses on SD-JWT VC (JWT/JOSE). It does not profile W3C VCDM 2.0 with Data Integrity proofs.

httpsIss.note: Issuer identification is DID-based in the profile rather than https issuer identifiers.

x509DocumentSigner.note: No X.509 document signer identifier scheme is specified.

didWeb.note: Profile uses DID:TDW (mapped here to didWebvh), not did:web.

didWebvh.note: Profile uses DID:TDW terminology (mapped to did:webvh in this capability set) for issuer identity.

didJwk.note: did:jwk is used for wallet proof key references (see holder binding), not as issuer identifier.

cnfKeyBinding.note: Key binding via cnf claim is supported/used for holder binding in SD-JWT VC flows.

deviceBound.note: Device/key-bound holding supported as profiled by SD-JWT VC + proof-of-possession flows.

didWebOrganisations.note: No did:web-based holder binding mechanism is specified.

didJwkPersons.note: Wallet proof JWTs reference keys via kid as did:jwk (holder key reference).

didWebvh.note: did:webvh is used for issuer/verifier identifiers; holder binding is via cnf/did:jwk key references.

openidClientIdAuth.note: OID4VP client_id / client_id_scheme mechanisms are used as profiled.

x509ReaderCertificate.note: No X.509 reader certificate mechanism is profiled.

didWeb.note: Verifier identification is DID:TDW (mapped here to didWebvh), not did:web.

didWebvh.note: Profile uses DID:TDW terminology (mapped to did:webvh) for verifier identity.

didJwk.note: did:jwk is used for holder key references rather than verifier identifiers.

jwtValidity.note: JWT validity fields (e.g., exp/iat) are used/supported in profiled flows.

pkiCertValidity.note: No PKI certificate validity model is specified for credential status.

ietfTokenStatusList.note: IETF Token Status List is used/supported for SD-JWT VC status.

joseJws.note: JWT/JOSE signing is used for SD-JWT VC and proof JWTs.

cose.note: COSE is not in scope of this profile.

w3cDataIntegrity.note: W3C Data Integrity proofs are not used in this profile.

eddsa.note: EdDSA is not profiled for Public Beta.
